issue.title: [R] Allow string input to as_type()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12908](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12908). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the function `as_type()` expects argument `type` to be a `DataType`, e.g.
```r

as_type(int32())
## Int32
## int32
```
It would be nice if this function could also accept a string and return a `DataType`, e.g.  
```r

as_type("int32")
## Int32
## int32
```
See discussion here: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10327#discussion_r640171712>
